page.title: 17Emergency Services.
page.content: Our area has three emergency services. They are the Fire Brigade, the Police and the Ambulance service. You can contact them by telephone by dialling 999. There is no charge for this call. We have an Ambulance Station in the area which is situated next to the hospital. It houses about twnty ambulance vehicles. Mansfield also has a Police Station and a Fire Station. There is a large tower behind the Fire Station which the firemen use for practicing using both ladders and hydraulic platforms. All of the three emergency services often come into schools to talk to the children amd demonstrate different aspects of their work.
